titleStmt.title: A briefe shevv of the false vvares packt together in the named, Apology of the Churche of England. By Iohn Rastell M. of Art and student of diuinitie

titleStmt.author: Rastell, John, 1532-1577.

notesStmt.note: Answers: Jewel, John. Apologia ecclesiæ anglicanæ.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
